text: CLOSE Snippets from the 911 call where an Uber driver claimed that NFL player attacked him. Video : Michael Schwab / The Tennessean Buy Photo Former Titan Michael Oher ( center ) leaves the Justice A. A. Birch Building after his preliminary hearing for assaulting an Uber driver was continued to a later date in Judge Melissa Blackburn's courtroom Friday, July 21, 2017, in Nashville, Tenn. ( Photo : George Walker IV / Tennessean ) Buy Photo Prosecutors have dismissed an assault charge against former Tennessee Titan Michael Oher in connection with an incident involving an Uber driver earlier this year. Court records show the case was dismissed Tuesday morning in Davidson County General Sessions Court. Oher, who's from Memphis, was the subject of the best seller ` ` The
